nodes.text: Namadii was an Mid Rim astronomical object located in the grid square I-6 of the Standard Galactic Grid. It was linked by a hyperspace route to Ansion and shared its name with the Namadii Corridor, a route along which the Core Worlds planet Coruscant was situated.

Namadii was first depicted in the new Star Wars canon on a galactic map in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars Roleplaying boxed set. Namadii was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity via map label in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. In 2014, Namadii was established as a distinct astronomical object by the Core Rulebook of the Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
